proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 200 hours annually on proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, creating client proposals eats at least 3 hours. With our system, it takes 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing losses Shida faces every day.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal demands 3 hours of your time. That's 600 hours a year not spent on design innovation.

problems.title: Lost Opportunities
problems.description: Every hour spent on proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. Annually, that's potentially 30 lost contracts.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manual proposals risk brand misalignment. Each inconsistency could confuse clients, costing you trust and deals.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Errors in proposals can lead to client dissatisfaction. Correcting these mistakes takes time and could lose you repeat business.

problems.title: Resource Overload
problems.description: With only 4 team members, proposal creation strains your resources. This impacts your ability to focus on delivering creative solutions.

problems.title: Missed Deadlines
problems.description: Manual processes mean slower turnaround. Delays risk missing client deadlines, damaging your reputation and losing business.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces every pain point described above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to craft. Our system completes them in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual work risks brand inconsistency. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Shida's image.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Human error is inevitable in manual proposals. Our system eliminates errors, ensuring client satisfaction.

solutions.title: Resource Optimization
solutions.description: Currently, proposals stretch your team's capacity. Our system frees your team to focus on design excellence.

solutions.title: Deadline Assurance
solutions.description: Manual processes risk delays. Our system guarantees proposal delivery on time, every time.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Brand with Shida's Expert Graphic Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our plan focuses on enhancing Acme Corp's visual identity to drive engagement and conversion.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is experiencing significant revenue losses due to current challenges.

problems.title: Outdated Visual Identity
problems.description: An outdated brand image can lead to a 15% decrease in customer trust. This directly affects your conversion rates.

problems.title: Poor Website Engagement
problems.description: Low engagement rates on your website result in 25% potential clients leaving without interaction, causing missed revenue opportunities.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Inconsistent branding across platforms can reduce brand recognition by 30%, leading to lost market share.

problems.title: Suboptimal User Experience
problems.description: A confusing user experience can increase bounce rates by 40%, translating to lost potential sales.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Materials
problems.description: Marketing materials that fail to capture attention can decrease lead generation effectiveness by 20%.

problems.title: Lack of Social Media Presence
problems.description: A weak social media strategy can result in a 50% reduction in audience reach and engagement.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions address these losses, enhancing Acme Corp's brand and engagement.

solutions.title: Brand Identity Design
solutions.description: Revitalize your brand with a cohesive and modern visual identity. This will restore customer trust and increase conversion rates.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Improve user engagement with a streamlined and user-friendly website design. This helps to lower bounce rates and boost sales.

solutions.title: Marketing Material Design
solutions.description: Create impactful marketing materials that capture attention and enhance lead generation effectiveness.

solutions.title: Social Media Strategy
solutions.description: Enhance your social media presence to increase audience reach by 50% and drive higher engagement.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida offers unparalleled expertise in transforming brands through design.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With over a decade of experience, we know how to elevate brands effectively.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Approach
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are informed by data, ensuring measurable results for your business.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Process
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with our clients, ensuring alignment with their vision and goals.

whyUsCards.title: Focused Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Our tailored services are designed to address your specific challenges and opportunities.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team behind your success.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring projects align with client goals and achieve results.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We start by understanding your business and goals.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Crafting designs and solutions tailored to your needs.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Bringing designs to life and integrating solutions.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: Assessing effectiveness and making necessary adjustments.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a conversation about how we can help you achieve your goals.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
